fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose to manually detonate all your Mines. (1 use)
- At night, Astrally launch a covert Mine at another target. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you use the Factional Attack, you may opt to secretly plant a Mine at your target's house, instead of directly attacking them.
- If anybody visits a player who had a Mine placed on them in a previous night, the Mine will detonate, causing a Basic Attack to the player it was planted on and one random visitor. The Mine will then be destroyed.
- You are not notified if a Mine detonates.
- You may use Mines/Factional Attacks on yourself.

fields.name: Upgrade:
fields.value:
- 1 use Basic Defense
- Detonated Mines now kill all non-Warfleet visitors.
- Upon being Upgraded, you will gain a use for both of your abilities.
